sentences.english: She worked tirelessly and had the knack of remembering everyone's name.
sentences.chinese: 她不知疲倦的工作，而且能够记住每个人的名字。

sentences.english: Jap training methods are both humorless and tireless.
sentences.chinese: 日本人的训练方法即缺乏幽默感又不知疲倦。

sentences.english: Courageous, bold, almost to the point of ferocity, they were untiring and resistant to pain.
sentences.chinese: 勇敢，大胆，几乎到了凶猛点，他们不知疲倦和耐痛。

sentences.english: Tireless exporter of goods and importer of jobs?
sentences.chinese: 不知疲倦的产品出口国和就业进口国？

sentences.english: He was an untiring advocate of economic reform.
sentences.chinese: 他是个不知疲倦的经济改革的倡导者。

sentences.english: Added to this, he is an untiring worker.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他是一个不知疲倦的工人。

sentences.english: Added to this, he is an untiring artist.
sentences.chinese: 而且，他是一个不知疲倦的艺术家。
你遇到困难时会不知疲倦吗？

sentences.english: He works hard day and night as if he never knew triteness .
sentences.chinese: 他日夜拼命工作，好像不知疲倦似的。

sentences.english: She works hard as if she never knew fatigue.
sentences.chinese: 她工作努力，仿佛从不知疲倦似的。

sentences.english: Her tireless ministrations to the wounded soldiers made her famous all over the world.
sentences.chinese: 她对伤员不知疲倦的照顾使她誉满全球。

sentences.english: None of the competitors could catch up with the untiring runner who was in the lead.
sentences.chinese: 没有一个参赛者能追上那个不知疲倦的领跑者。

sentences.english: The indefatigable bell now sounded for the fourth time.
sentences.chinese: 那不知疲倦的钟声现在敲第四遍了。

sentences.english: As used on the little hand, picking the one into a basket carried on the back, as if tireless.
sentences.chinese: 就那样用小手，一枚一枚的捡进背篓，仿佛不知疲倦。

sentences.english: And Picking Mulberry, or singing along.
sentences.chinese: 采桑子，高唱欢歌，谁也不知疲倦。

definition: lit. diligent and never slacking (idiom); continuous concentrated effort/assiduous (in study)/to concentrate
night and day (idiom); continuous strenuous effort
day and night/regardless of the time of day or night
to enjoy sth and never tire of it (idiom)
lit. lively dragon and animated tiger (idiom)/fig. vigorous and lively
to drip with sweat/sweat poured off (him)
